plot: A homeless schizophrenic physician, who claims he has invented a time machine, is being investigated by an unorthodox detective for the disappearance of his wife, Mia.
title: The Investigation of a Time Traveler
plot_es: A homeless schizophrenic physician, who claims he has invented a time machine, is being investigated by an unorthodox detective for the disappearance of his wife, Mia.
original_name: The Investigation of a Time Traveler
plot_en: A homeless schizophrenic physician, who claims he has invented a time machine, is being investigated by an unorthodox detective for the disappearance of his wife, Mia.
